price: 37. El hombre ha sido creado impaciente. Les mostraré las pruebas de Mi poder; no quieran, pues, precipitar (Mi castigo).
arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: khuliqa al-insānu min ʿajalin sa-urīkum āyātī falā tastaʿjilūni
